sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"建设，建立，建造"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: build, construct, found, erect, establish, set up
means: build ： 普通用词，含义广泛，可指一切具体或抽象的建造或建立。
construct ： 较正式用词，强调根据一定计划进行的规模较大，结构较复杂，要求较高技术的建造。
found ： 侧重打下基础或创办，具体或抽象事物均可用。
erect ： 侧重指对高而垂直物的建造。使用不如build广泛。
establish ： 着重稳固地建成，可具体指国家、政府、学校或商店等的建立，也可指信仰、信用、名誉、法律、制度、规则等的建立。
set up ： 作"建立"用时，侧重于"开始"。可指具体或抽象的建立。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"证明，证实"之意。
means: prove ： 普通用词，指通过某种手段或方式提供证据以证实或证明某事物真实与否，某结论正确与否等情况。
certify ： 较正式用词，多指有签字盖章的、合符法律程序的书面证明。
demonstrate ： 指通过推理、辩论、实验或以实例来证明事物的正确与否。常用于理论、学说、定律等的证明上。
establish ： 指证实事实或理论的真实性与正确性，使其能长期存在或为人们所接受。
testify ： 较正式用词，既指出庭作证，提供证据，又指为某人或某事的是否真实提供证据或证明。

sentence.Network_en: We're trying to establish linkages between these groups and financial institutions.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们正努力在这些团体和金融机构之间建立联系。

sentence.Network_en: He explored the wound with his finger, trying to establish its extent.
sentence.Network_cn: 他用手指摸了摸伤口，想要确定受伤的程度。

sentence.Network_en: His opportunity to re-establish himself had been nobbled by the manager's tactics.
sentence.Network_cn: 他重新树立自己地位的机会因教练的战术而流产了。

确字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 确乎〖 really;indeed〗 确立〖 establish〗 确论〖 appropriateviewsonpolitics〗.
定_百度百科 ... （3） 平定[ put down] （6） 奠定[ establish] （8） 决定[ decide].

list.abs: 英语词典 - 豆丁网 ... environmental strategy 环境战略 establishment 机构 ethical audit （公司）伦理审计.
establishment of the car after - sales service system information facing the new century ., 面向新世纪的汽车售后服务系统信息化建设.
【免费下载】考研英语词汇大全 - 豆丁网 ... transaction n. 交易 established adj. 确定的，既定的 partner n. 伙伴.
The largest is the Abu Dhabi Investment Authority , established in 1976 ., 最大的主权财富基金由阿布扎比投资局成立于 1976年.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (recorded earlier as stablish): from Old French establiss-, lengthened stem of establir, from Latin stabilire 'make firm', from stabilis (adjective) 'stable'

entry.def: If someone establishes something such as an organization, a type of activity, or a set of rules, they create it or introduce it in such a way that it is likely to last for a long time.

example.ex: The UN has established detailed criteria for who should be allowed to vote...
example.tran: 联合国已经制定了有关投票资格的标准细则。

example.ex: The School was established in 1989 by an Italian professor.
example.tran: 这所学院由一名意大利教授于1989年创建。

entry.def: If you establish contact with someone, you start to have contact with them. You can also say that two people, groups, or countries establish contact.

example.ex: We had already established contact with the museum...
example.tran: 我们已经和那家博物馆建立了联系。

example.ex: Singapore and South Africa have established diplomatic relations.
example.tran: 新加坡和南非已经建立了外交关系。

entry.def: If you establish that something is true, you discover facts that show that it is definitely true.

example.ex: Medical tests established that she was not their own child...
example.tran: 医学化验证实她不是他们的亲骨肉。

example.ex: It will be essential to establish how the money is being spent...
example.tran: 查清楚这笔钱将作何用途至关重要。

entry.tran: 使立足;使被认可;确立(地位)
entry.def: If you establish yourself, your reputation, or a good quality that you have, you succeed in doing something, and achieve respect or a secure position as a result of this.

example.ex: This is going to be the show where up-and-coming comedians will establish themselves...
example.tran: 这将是大有前途的喜剧演员们让自己获得认可的节目。

example.ex: He has established himself as a pivotal figure in US politics...
example.tran: 他已经确立了自己在美国政界的核心地位。

means.word_mean: 2. set up or lay the groundwork for;
3. establish the validity of something, as by an example, explanation or experiment;

sentences.sentence: "The experiment demonstrated the instability of the compound"
"The mathematician showed the validity of the conjecture"
"Her manager had set her up at the Ritz"

means.word_mean: 7. use as a basis for; found on;

auth_sentence.content: There is no need to establish such a mechanism.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is no need to establish such a mechanism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is no need to establish such a mechanism.

auth_sentence.content: 'We need to establish discipline in our national life.
auth_sentence.res_content: 'We need to establish discipline in our national life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: 'We need to establish discipline in our national life.

auth_sentence.content: He says Europe must also establish transnational power grids.
auth_sentence.res_content: He says Europe must also establish transnational power grids.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He says Europe must also establish transnational power grids.

stems_affixes.word_buile: stab=stable稳定的,安定的+ility→n.稳定,安定
sta站,立+age场所,状态等→n.舞台，戏剧；阶段，时期

stems_affixes.value_cn: 逗留, 延缓, 中止, 支柱
stems_affixes.word_buile: sta站,立+y→n.逗留, 延缓, 中止, 支柱 v.在, 暂住
e=ex+stable牢固的+ish表动词→establish使其完全牢固→建立,设立,安置
sta站,立+y→n.逗留, 延缓, 中止, 支柱 v.在, 暂住

Sentence.sentence: But as the nursing shortage worsens, a growing number of schools and hospitals are establishing "fast-track programs" that enable college graduates with no nursing experience to become registered nurses with only a year or so of specialized training.
Suburban high schools were established in the hope of increasing economic efficiency.
Steven Kayne, who has just taken over and established bicycle shop.
Once in Mexico, they establish themselves in one of about 15 sizes in the mountain forth.
The government also established a stockpile (贮存) of oil as a short-term buffer (缓冲) against future shortages.
As a measure to counter future shortages, the American government decided to establish a stockpile of oil in caves underground.

sentences.en: We have established diplomatic relations with many countries.
sentences.cn: 我们已和许多国家建立了外交关系。

sentences.en: They established themselves between the Danube and Greece.
sentences.cn: 他们在多瑙河和希腊之间定居下来。

sentences.en: The police established that she was innocent.

means.word_mean: 使开业，使营业；使立足于；(因结婚、就业等)使安身，使立身；扶植；使任职，派，委任

sentences.en: Jack quickly established himself as a powerful member of the new company.
sentences.cn: 杰克在新公司里使自己很快成为一名强有力的成员。

means.word_mean: 确立，树立，创立(理论、声望等)；使(先例等)被接受，使被承认，认可

sentences.en: He established himself as a leading surgeon.
sentences.cn: 他使自己被承认为主治外科医师。

means.word_mean: 定(某宗教)为国教，使成为国教

sentences.en: The established religion of Egypt is Islam.
sentences.cn: 埃及的国教是伊斯兰教。

jushi.english: Every possibility has been exploited to establish a number of schools.
jushi.chinese: 利用一切可能性建立了许多学校。

jushi.english: The theory is not yet scientifically established.
jushi.chinese: 这个理论尚未被科学证实。

jushi.english: Newton conclusively established the law of gravity.
jushi.chinese: 牛顿确定了万有引力定律。
